mapper.sql: g_id, g_name, g_address, g_producer, g_unit, g_inprice, g_outprice, t_id
mapper.select:
select from erp_goods where 1=1
and g_producer=#{gProducer}

select from erp_goods where 1=1
and g_name=#{gName}
mapper.insert: insert into erp_goods (g_id, g_name, g_address, g_producer, g_unit, g_inprice, g_outprice, t_id) values (#{gId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gProducer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gInprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{gOutprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

g_id,

mapper.update:
update erp_goods
g_name = #{gName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
g_address = #{gAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
g_producer = #{gProducer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
g_unit = #{gUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
g_inprice = #{gInprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
g_outprice = #{gOutprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where g_id = #{gId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
